overview: When a happily married family man, who would never consider an affair, meets a beautiful woman in red, he is totally infatuated and desperate to make her acquaintance. However, as he tries out various schemes to sneak out to meet her, he realizes that adultery is not quite as easy as it looks.
tagline: He's head over heels and headed straight for trouble!
cast: Gene Wilder|Charles Grodin|Joseph Bologna|Judith Ivey|Michael Huddleston
